game.name: 打工人生
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: "Wage Life" is a game that mainly focuses on job training, simulation management, and romantic adventures. This is a part-time job life that belongs to you.
